Name: Pizza Casserole
Description: You can easily personalize this recipe to suit your family's taste. Not only is it quick 'n easy, it tastes great, too! The kids will absolutely love it. I once took this to a Parent/Teen function at church, I've never had so many teenagers ask me for a recipe! Top casserole with your favorite pizza toppings.
Author: ALMORELAND

Name: Roasted Chicken with Lemon and Rosemary
Description: This quick-and-easy, simple-and-delicious roasted chicken with lemon and rosemary is perfect for a weeknight dinner or when you have guests.
Author: cherylb413

Name: Smokey Chipotle Meatloaf
Description: Spicy, sweet and smokey flavor, this meatloaf is easily adaptable to your personal taste. It makes THE BEST sandwiches from leftovers!
Author: Joan Dredge

Name: Spaghetti Squash Pad Thai
Description: Replace rice noodles with shredded spaghetti squash in this lower carb recipe for pad thai.
Author: SunnyDaysNora

Name: Chef John's Picadillo
Description: A Cuban creation, picadillo is one of the world's great ground meat dishes. Chef John uses beef, but you can add pork and/or chorizo. Serve with rice.
Author: Chef John

Name: Strawberry Kiwi Smoothie
Description: This strawberry-kiwi smoothie gets a tart kick from orange juice and a little extra sweetness from honey. Perfect for any time of day.
Author: Hannah

Name: Gluten Free and Paleo Tuna Avocado Cups
Description: Perfectly ripened avocado stuffed with a healthy tuna salad that's packed with tons of flavor!
Author: Bumble Bee

Name: Boozy Banana Bread
Description: Lots of ripe bananas and a hint of amaretto liqueur make a delicious "boozy" banana bread--and it's even better served with butter.
Author: Big Perm

Name: Pork Tenderloin Diablo
Description: This is a great pork recipe. Mustard is a classic with pork, but when you add the extra zing of horseradish and cayenne, and then smooth it out with a little cream and butter, well, it's devilishly delicious.
Author: Chef John

Name: Sticky Rice Pork Balls
Description: Pork meat balls with ginger and soy sauce are coated with sticky rice in this recipe for Chinese steamed rice balls, always a favorite dish.
Author: buxuhong

Name: Gnocchi Alla Romana (Baked Semolina Gnocchi)
Description: Homemade gnocchi alla Romana, made with semolina, Grana Padano and Gruyere cheese, are flecked with pancetta in this authentic Italian dish.
Author: clara

Name: New Year's Day Ozoni Soup
Description: This ozoni soup, made with mochi, chicken, shrimp, spinach and mushrooms, is a soup traditionally eaten on New Year's Day in Japan.
Author: lilbrngal

Name: Mango Sago Cream
Description: Sago pearls are simmered and mixed with mango and pomelo and topped with coconut cream in this dainty Asian dessert that is dairy free!
Author: Lin Fang

Name: Low-Carb Keto Bread
Description: Almond flour, coconut flour, grapeseed oil, and eggs form the basis of this low-carb keto bread that works for a gluten-free diet.
Author: Girly Hobbies

Name: Chinese Sweet and Sour Spare Ribs
Description: Pork spare ribs are deep-fried and coated with a sticky sweet and sour sauce in this Chinese-inspired recipe your whole family will love.
Author: yanyangtian

Name: Saffron Breakfast Bread
Description: A pinch of Iranian saffron adds a pop of color and a delicate floral taste to these beautiful braided bread loves perfect for brunch.
Author: Cab399

Name: Flavorful Persian Braised Lamb Shanks
Description: Lamb shanks are braised in a flavorful broth with saffron, lime juice, and fresh herbs in this impressive dish fit for a Persian feast.
Author: Andraya Winters

Name: Boranie Bademjan (Persian Eggplant Yogurt Dip)
Description: Roasted eggplant is mixed with Greek yogurt, crushed garlic, and fresh mint to make this delicious Persian dip known as boranie bademjan.
Author: kopolpa

Name: Mushroom Lasagna with Garlic Parmesan Cream Sauce
Description: Portobello mushrooms are layered with a creamy garlic sauce in this hearty lasagna with 3 kinds of cheese: feta, Parmesan, and mozzarella.
Author: cherrybaum

Name: Asparagus and Smoked Salmon Bundles with Meyer Lemon Sauce
Description: Mascarpone cheese, smoked salmon, and asparagus are wrapped up in lasagna noodles and doused in Meyer lemon sauce in this elegant main dish.
Author: SWEETEC

Name: Baked Cauliflower Fries
Description: These cheese-y baked cauliflower fries take a bit of time but, served with a spicy ketchup dip, they'd make a great party snack.
Author: Chef John

Name: Classic Rice Pudding
Description: Chef John uses a simplified one-pot method to make this creamy, comforting, crowd-pleasing rice pudding.
Author: Chef John

Name: Grilled Corn Salad with Roasted Jalapeno Dressing
Description: Grilled corn and halloumi salad is tossed in a roasted jalapeno dressing in this refreshing summer salad perfect for hot evenings.
Author: Vampire Gran

Name: Sichuan Cucumber Salad
Description: Sliced cucumbers are tossed in a hot and spicy Sichuan-style dressing to make this light and refreshing salad packed full of flavor.
Author: Chelsea

Name: Creamy Lychee Jelly
Description: Canned lychees, milk, and gelatin set into a sweet and fruit jelly in this easy recipe for an exotic Chinese dessert you can make ahead.
Author: tonytsang

Name: Meatless Dairy-Free Taco Dip
Description: Seasoned chickpeas are blended with taco seasoning to make this meatless, dairy-free dip you can dig into if you are lactose intolerant.
Author: LovelyRitaMetermaid

Name: Meatless Meatballs
Description: Pecan meal, shredded cheese, and cracker crumbs form the base of these meatless meatballs that are deep-fried and simmered in mushroom soup.
Author: Angi Scott

Name: Saffron Alfredo
Description: This recipe makes a huge amount of a rich saffron Alfredo sauce you can freeze and use as a flavorful base for any number of pasta sauces.
Author: Ken Spaulding

Name: Shiraz Salad
Description: Shiraz salad, a fresh mix of cucumber, tomato, onion, mint, and lemon juice, is a side dish served with almost every Persian meal.
Author: Marianne
